work.summary: Worked service, such as at the front counter or in the drive-thru
highlights: Handling multiple tasks at once, such as talking to a drive-thru customer while bagging an order
Communicating with customers who may not understand pricing or serving details
Coordinating with other team members to efficiently get orders out
Perservering through long shifts and late nights

work.summary: Computer Science instructor for the Summer Institute program
highlights: Preparing a curriculum that integrates Native Hawaiian culture and history into computer science
Leading coding lessons for students from middle to high school
Supervising the students and ensuring good behavior and encouraging learning opportunities
Developing a video to showcase what the students have learned alongside their favorite projects

volunteer.summary: Leading ICSpark, a coding mentorship organization
highlights: Scheduling and facilitating officer meetings, ensuring minimal downtime
Networking with other organizations and seeking collaboration opportunities
Representing the organization and spreading its purpose and goals

awards.title: UH Manoa Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
